title: Arietta of Spirits Free Download
description:
Get Arietta of Spirits v1.2.8.0 PC game for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP
Arietta of Spirits is a charming adventure game with emotion-filled narrative, no-filler gameplay, and fast paced combat. The game tells the story of Arietta and her family, visiting their Grandmother’s cabin for the first time after her passing away a year prior .
However, the family trip takes an unexpected turn when Arietta meets a mysterious new friend and gains the ability to see strange spirits that inhabit the island .
